original_title: Mark Gatiss on John Minton: The Lost Man of British Art
overview: For the actor and writer Mark Gatiss, Minton has been something of an obsession since he first came across his work as a teenager and in this personal, authored film, he tells the story of Mintonâ€™s colourful, complex life for the first time on television.
title: Mark Gatiss on John Minton: The Lost Man of British Art
